import React,{useState} from 'react' import { Container, Form, Button } from 'react-bootstrap' const Register = () => { const [name, setName] = useState('') const [email, setEmail] = useState('') const [password, setPassword] = useState('') const [confirmPassword, setConfirmPassword] = useState('') return ( <>

Registration

Name setName(e.target.value)}/> Email address setEmail(e.target.value)} /> We'll never share your email with anyone else. Password setPassword(e.target.value)} /> Confirm Password setConfirmPassword(e.target.value)}/>
) } export default Register
